channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Platform Trust Technology (PTT)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Platform Trust Technology (PTT)

item.title: CVE-2018-3659|2024-08-05T04:50:30.385Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20platform%20trust%20technology%20%28ptt%29
item.description: A vulnerability in Intel PTT module in Intel CSME firmware before version 12.0.5 and Intel TXE firmware before version 4.0 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially disclose information via physical access.
